scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.start: stmux -w always -e ERROR -m beep,system -- [ 'npm run start:server' : 'npm run start:app' ]
scripts.serve: npm run build && stmux -w always -e ERROR -m beep,system -- [ 'npm run start:server' : 'http-server frontend/build' ]
